name: AI-Powered Resume Screening and Candidate Ranking System

parameters.formDescription: Submit your resume for automated screening and evaluation

assignments.name: jobDescription
assignments.value: We are seeking talented professionals to join our team. The ideal candidate should demonstrate strong technical skills, relevant experience, and cultural fit with our organization.

options.systemMessage:
=You are an expert HR recruiter and resume analyst. Your task is to thoroughly evaluate the candidate's resume against the job requirements and provide a comprehensive assessment.

Job Role: {{ $json.jobRole }}
Job Description: {{ $json.jobDescription }}

Analyze the resume for:
1. **Skills Match**: How well do the candidate's skills align with the job requirements? Identify present and missing skills.
2. **Experience Quality**: Evaluate years of experience, relevance, progression, and achievements.
3. **Education & Certifications**: Assess educational background and relevant certifications.
4. **Career Gaps**: Identify any unexplained gaps or red flags in employment history.
5. **Cultural Fit Indicators**: Look for soft skills, teamwork, leadership, and values alignment.

Provide:
- Overall score (0-100)
- Classification: Strong Fit (70-100), Average (50-69), or Reject (0-49)
- Key strengths (list)
- Key gaps or concerns (list)
- Recommendation summary

Be objective, fair, and thorough in your evaluation.

value.Name: ={{ $('Resume Upload Form').item.json.fullName }}

nodes.name: Store All Results in Google Sheets

parameters.subject: =Next Steps - {{ $('Prepare AI Analysis Input').item.json.jobRole }} Application
parameters.message:
=

Dear {{ $('Prepare AI Analysis Input').item.json.candidateName }},

Thank you for applying for the {{ $('Prepare AI Analysis Input').item.json.jobRole }} position.

We are pleased to inform you that your application has been reviewed and you have been shortlisted for the next round of our hiring process. Your qualifications and experience align well with what we are looking for.

Next Steps:

  • Our HR team will contact you within 2-3 business days to schedule an interview
  • Please keep an eye on your email and phone for our communication

We look forward to speaking with you soon!

Best regards,
HR Team

parameters.subject: =Application Status - {{ $('Prepare AI Analysis Input').item.json.jobRole }}
parameters.message:
=

Dear {{ $('Prepare AI Analysis Input').item.json.candidateName }},

Thank you for taking the time to apply for the {{ $('Prepare AI Analysis Input').item.json.jobRole }} position with us.

After careful review of your application, we regret to inform you that we will not be moving forward with your candidacy at this time. This decision was not easy, as we received many qualified applications.

We encourage you to:

  • Keep an eye on our careers page for future opportunities that may be a better fit
  • Continue building your skills and experience in areas relevant to your career goals

We appreciate your interest in our organization and wish you the best in your job search.

Best regards,
HR Team

parameters.content:
📝 FORM INPUT SECTION

Collects candidate information and resume upload:
• Personal details (name, email, phone)
• Job role selection from dropdown
• Resume file upload (PDF/DOCX)
• Form configured with n8n attribution disabled

Starts the automated screening workflow

🤖 AI ANALYSIS SECTION

Intelligent resume evaluation using OpenAI:
• Analyzes skills match against job requirements
• Evaluates experience quality and relevance
• Assesses education and certifications
• Identifies career gaps and red flags
• Scores candidate 0-100
• Returns structured JSON output

⚠️ Requires: OpenAI API credentials

🔀 CANDIDATE TRIAGE & ROUTING

Classifies candidates based on AI score:
• Strong Fit: Score ≥ 70 → Acceptance path
• Below threshold: Score < 70 → Rejection path

Thresholds configurable in Workflow Configuration node

Routes to appropriate notification and email flows

📊 DATA PERSISTENCE

Stores ALL candidate results in Google Sheets:
• Timestamp, candidate info, job role
• AI scores and classification
• Strengths, gaps, skills analysis
• Experience years and recommendation
• Resume link for easy access

Provides audit trail and analytics capability

⚠️ Requires: Google Sheets document ID

# 🎯 Trigger Section

**Google Sheets Trigger**
Monitors the Resume_Data_2026 sheet for any updates every minute.

**What it does:**
- Polls sheet for new/updated rows
- Triggers workflow when changes detected
- Passes candidate data downstream

**Data includes:** Name, Phone, Email, Company, Role, Request, etc.

# 📱 Phone Standardization

**Code Node: Standardize Data**
Cleans and validates phone numbers to US format.

**Processing logic:**
- Removes all non-digit characters
- Handles 10-digit numbers (US format)
- Strips country code if +1 prefix exists
- Marks invalid formats as "incorrect format"

**Output:** Clean 10-digit number or error flag

# ⚠️ Error Handling

**IF Node: Incorrect Phone?**
Routes workflow based on phone validation result.

**Two paths:**
✅ **Valid Phone** → Proceeds to make call
❌ **Invalid Phone** → Logs to "Incorrect Phone" sheet

**Log Incorrect Phone Node:**
Records failed validations with status "Incorrect Phone #" for manual review

# 🚀 API Call Section

**HTTP Request: Call Lead**
Initiates outbound call via VAPI API.

**Request details:**
- Method: POST to https://api.vapi.ai/call
- Assistant ID: Pre-configured AI agent
- Phone Number ID: VAPI phone line
- Dynamic variables: lead_name, lead_company_name, lead_request

**Returns:** Call ID for tracking

# ⏳ Wait & Poll Logic

**Wait Node (60s)**
Initial delay to allow call to connect and progress.

**Get Call Details**
Fetches current call status from VAPI API using call ID.

**Polling Node (10s)**
Repeats status check every 10 seconds if call not ended.

**Why needed:** Calls take time; we need to wait for completion before logging results

# 🔍 Call Status Check

**Limit Node**
Ensures only one item processed (prevents duplicate checks).

**IF Node: Ended?**
Checks if call status = "ended"

**Two outcomes:**
✅ **Ended** → Proceed to voicemail detection
⏳ **Still Active** → Loop back to Polling node

**Prevents:** Logging incomplete call data

# 📧 Voicemail Detection

**IF Node: Voicemail?**
Checks if endedReason = "voicemail"

**Two paths:**
📞 **Voicemail** → Log as "Call Back" status
✅ **Answered** → Log complete conversation

**Why important:**
- Different follow-up actions needed
- Voicemails require manual callback
- Answered calls have transcript data

# 📝 Logging Results

**Log Voicemail Node**
Appends row with status "Call Back" and N/A for conversation fields.

**Log Complete Node**
Updates original sheet with:
- AI Call Status: "Done"
- AI Discussion: Full transcript
- Recording URL: Link to call recording

**Matches by:** Phone Number (ensures correct row updated)

# 📞 Outbound Call Workflow

This workflow automates calling candidates from Google Sheets. It validates phone numbers, makes AI-powered calls via VAPI, monitors call status, and logs results back to the spreadsheet.

**Key Features:**
- Phone number validation & standardization
- AI voice agent integration
- Voicemail detection
- Automatic result logging

main.node: Store All Results in Google Sheets
Store All Results in Google Sheets
